question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.


Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter


explain the reasons for the noise


apologise


describe what action you will take


You should write at least 150 words.
text: Hi, I am your neighbour who lives next door to you. I apologize for what happened last week and I am truly sorry for the noise caused by my daughter. I insist to write this letter as  a formal apology.

Please let me explain what happened  that night. First, I admit that it is sometimes difficult for single mothers like me to handle the relationship between myself and my teenage daughter. She had played the video games for nearly 4 hours after dinner, So I had to convince  her to go to bed instead of continuing to play. However, a peaceful argument  somehow tends to loud quarrels. Finally, we both realized argument is not helpful at all.

I apologize to wake you up at late night and I am also considering  better ways in educating my child.  In fact, my daughter actually had a verbal agreement with me that she made a promise to go to bed on time. So it will not happen again as we promised.
